product_overview: Performance Prime MVP is a comprehensive fitness and workout management platform featuring user authentication, AI coaching, workout tracking, scheduling, and progress analytics designed to enhance user fitness experience and engagement.
core_goals: Provide a secure and seamless user authentication system to protect user data and enable personalized experiences.
Deliver an interactive and insightful AI coach to offer customized workout plans and fitness advice.
Enable efficient workout management including exercise creation, tracking, and automatic workout generation.
Offer intuitive scheduling and appointment management to streamline user access to training sessions.
Provide detailed dashboard and analytics to track user progress, metrics, and performance trends.
Support personalized user profiles with goals, achievements, and progress history.
Ensure high usability across mobile and desktop platforms with responsive UI and internationalization.
Implement a robust notes system and workout timer to enhance user tracking and session control.
Manage subscriptions and premium features securely and conveniently.
Maintain a polished, accessible, and consistent UI using reusable components and modern technologies.
key_features: Complete authentication system with Supabase including login, registration, password reset, and route protection.
Dashboard displaying key metrics, weekly progress, recent activities, and quick actions.
AI Coach module with chat interface, personalized plans, and fitness insights.
Comprehensive workout management with exercise details, tracking, and automated workout generation.
Schedule and appointments system with calendar views and appointment management.
User profile and settings management including goals, achievements, and preferences.
Personal note-taking system for workout logs and progress tracking.
Workout timer for precise session timing.
Multi-language support and mobile device optimization.
Reusable UI components based on Shadcn/ui for consistent design.
QR code generation and display capabilities.
Landing and smart home page for user engagement and onboarding.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via the authentication system.
User navigates to the Dashboard to view stats, progress, and recent activity.
User accesses the AI Coach to receive personalized plans and tips via chat.
User manages workouts by creating, tracking, and completing exercises.
User schedules appointments and manages training sessions through the calendar interface.
User updates profile information, sets goals, and reviews achievements.
User creates and edits personal workout notes for tracking progress.
User utilizes the workout timer during exercise sessions.
User manages subscription plans and accesses premium features as needed.
User logs out securely from the application.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration, login, and password reset workflows without errors.
Dashboard loads accurate and up-to-date user metrics and activity data.
AI Coach delivers relevant, personalized plans and responses based on user input.
Workout management functionalities operate correctly including exercise creation, tracking, and workout generation.
Appointment scheduling and calendar features function smoothly with correct data display.
User profile updates persist correctly and achievements track accurately.
Notes system allows adding, editing, and deleting workout notes without issue.
Timer counts accurately and integrates well with workout sessions.
Subscription management processes payments and updates subscription status accurately.
UI components render consistently across devices and support internationalization.
Mobile responsiveness verified on major device types; app performs well with Capacitor.
QR code generation and display works correctly in relevant contexts.
No frontend errors occur during typical user flows including login, navigation, and logout.
